translation.en: [commentator 1] Across every continent on the face of the globe,
to every lover of the game wherever you are…
[commentator 2 in French] …133rd game…
[commentator 1 in English] …whatever time of day or night…
welcome.
It is now that we establish
which, of Argentina and France, will become the owners, for four years,
translation.ko: 세계에서 가장 유명한 황금 트로피를 차지할 주인이

translation.en: of that most famous piece of gold.
[coach in French] Nothing is going to stop us today.
translation.ko: "카타르 루사일 루사일 스타디움" 아무도 우릴 막지 못해

translation.en: Let's play our game! Give everything you've got!
translation.ko: 우리 경기를 하면 돼! 전부 다 쏟아내

translation.en: Let's get that third star!
[commentator 1 in English] That is the World Cup.
Lionel Messi stares up at his final peak.
translation.ko: 리오넬 메시가 마지막 난관을 앞두고 있습니다

translation.en: Kylian Mbappé prowls in the foothills of greatness.
translation.ko: 킬리안 음바페는 전설이 될 기회를 노립니다

translation.en: From the Andes to the Alps,
from River Plate to the banks of the Seine,
our planet unites around its ultimate game.
translation.ko: 전 세계인이 하나 되어 이 최후의 경기를 지켜봅니다

translation.en: The time is nigh.
[in Spanish] The World Cup has that special something.
It hits you deeply and it stirs up deep emotions.
translation.ko: 눈을 떼기 힘들고 감정도 마구 요동치죠

translation.en: [Laurens in English] The World Cup is always amazing.
Every country has their own stories, every player has their own narrative.
translation.ko: 모든 참가국과 선수들에게 자기만의 사연과 이야기가 있어요

translation.en: [in French] The World Cup is simply the greatest competition.
Now, all behind the Blues.
[Mbappé] Messi and Cristiano, they're better players than me.
But I tell myself I'm the best.
[commentator] Kylian Mbappé!
[Messi in Spanish] It's my last chance to achieve my greatest dream.
translation.ko: 가장 위대한 꿈을 이룰 마지막 기회예요

translation.en: But this is a World Cup and it's really tough.
We destroyed you, loser! [bleep]
[Ronaldo in Portuguese] Some people like me, some people don't.
translation.ko: 저를 좋아하는 사람도 싫어하는 사람도 있어요

translation.en: But I'm proud of everything I've done.
translation.ko: 하지만 전 제가 이룬 게 자랑스러워요

translation.en: It wouldn't be fair to ask for more.
[Busquets in Spanish] Spain are at a point of generational change…
…with a very young team.
Nice one!
-One, two, three! -[all] Win, win, win!
Let's go!
[Silva in Portuguese] We're the Brazilian squad.
We're important.
Whether you like it or not, it brings a lot of pressure.
If you lose in Brazil, they kill you.
[Kane in English] The World Cup is the highest pressure tournament you'll play.
The hype around the game…
Go and win this fucking game. Come on!
[Kane] The rivalries amongst the teams.
[Bale] You have the best team from South America, North America,
translation.ko: 각 대륙 최고의 팀이 모였죠 남아메리카, 북아메리카

translation.en: Asia, Africa.
[Martinez in Spanish] The World Cup is madness.
It's madness, it's irrational.
This passion is very hard to explain.
[in French] We know we can do something historic.
translation.ko: 우린 역사적인 일을 해낼 수 있어요

translation.en: We want to keep making people dream.
[Yoshida in Japanese] It was a reminder that one mistake
can make a big difference at the World Cup.
translation.ko: 큰 차이를 만들어낸다는 걸 다시 한번 깨달았어요

translation.en: [Adams in English] Going into a World Cup, you know that
one team leaves the World Cup happy.
If we have to drag you off that pitch, we will.
translation.ko: 어쩔 수 없을 땐 바로 교체할 거야

translation.en: [in Japanese] We're going to fight again! Let's win, come on!
translation.ko: 다시 싸워보자! 이기는 거야! 기운 내!

translation.en: [Adams in English] Four teams in a group.
The top two teams make it out of the group.
-Get over here! -We ain't going, skip!
-[in Croatian] Above all… -Croatia!
[Adams in English] You don't wanna be stuck in the bottom two or else your journey's over.
translation.ko: 3, 4위로 떨어지는 건 피해야죠 그랬다간 월드컵도 끝이에요

translation.en: Every game from that point to the final is win or go home.
[in Portuguese] Everybody wants to win.
But there can only be one winner.
[in English] This World Cup is the end of an era.
For so many players, it's their last chance to win the ultimate prize.
translation.ko: 훌륭한 선수들이 최고의 상을 누릴 마지막 기회죠

translation.en: [in Portuguese] It's life or death.
♪ In '94, Romário ♪
♪ In 2002, Fenomeno ♪
♪ First to be five-time champion ♪
[Silva in Portuguese] The atmosphere is extremely good.
The mix of young and experienced players makes for better relationships.
translation.ko: 젊은 선수와 노련한 선수가 끈끈하게 이어졌죠

translation.en: We try to have fun. We try to be happy.
I want them to be happy.
I am proud to be part of the Brazilian team.
translation.ko: 전 브라질 대표팀인 게 자랑스러워요 "치아구 시우바 브라질 주장"

translation.en: [Bueno] Thiago Silva is a great player.
He's a leader. He displays the right conduct on and off the pitch.
translation.ko: 리더로서 필드 안팎에서 흐트러짐이 없어요 "가우방 부에누 전설적인 해설자"

translation.en: Thiago Silva…
[in French] I think he's one of the most professional players I've seen in my career.
translation.ko: 그렇게 프로 정신이 투철한 선수는 별로 본 적이 없어요

translation.en: [in Danish] He's one of the most complete defenders around.
translation.ko: 그렇게 완벽한 수비수는 몇 안 되죠

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Nice, bro!
[Bueno] He's had a distinguished career.
[Silva] I'm one of the most successful players in world football.
translation.ko: 전 축구계에서 대단히 성공한 축에 들어요

translation.en: But…
the World Cup is the one I want to win.
translation.ko: 제가 우승하고 싶은 건 바로 월드컵이에요

translation.en: Man, it's one of my biggest dreams.
translation.ko: 꼭 이루고 싶은 꿈 중 하나죠

translation.en: [commentator in English] Neymar's corner…
Brilliant header, Thiago Silva!
Brazil is Brazil,
and if you speak about the World Cup,
the first team that will come to everyone's mind is Brazil,
because they always bring talent and special qualities
to a World Cup that everyone wants to see.
[Adams] Neymar is one of the best ever.
[in Portuguese] It's wrong!
[in English] Lot of Brazil's performances are judged off of how he performs.
translation.ko: 보통 네이마르의 경기력에 따라 브라질의 경기력이 갈려요

translation.en: People say if he plays bad, then they won't win,
and if he plays good then they obviously have a greater chance of winning.
translation.ko: 네이마르가 잘하면 우승할 가능성이 크다고들 하죠

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] Neymar is such good fun, man.
Who's after you?
We talk to each other every day.
All good?
And we started to create a nice relationship, you know?
Mutual respect, recognition and affection.
He's also older like me… At least I'm not the only one.
translation.ko: 네이마르도 저처럼 나이가 있어요 저만 늙은 게 아니죠

translation.en: [Adams in English] Brazil, the expectation of going into World Cup is that you have to win.
translation.ko: 브라질이 월드컵에 출전하면 다들 우승을 기대해요

translation.en: Everything you do will be a failure unless you're holding the trophy at the end.
[journalist in Portuguese] Are you anxious?
[chuckling] No, not at all! Being anxious, it's normal.
I always get a bit anxious when things are fast approaching.
translation.ko: 일이 빠르게 진행되면 늘 조금 초조해져요

translation.en: Today, at the press conference, the first guy…
translation.ko: 오늘 기자회견에서 첫 질문을 던진 기자는

translation.en: The question was almost like an attack.
translation.ko: 저를 꼭 공격하려고 질문한 것 같았어요

translation.en: Trying to bring me down at a critical time for Brazil.
translation.ko: 대표팀에 중요한 시기에 절 무너뜨리려는 거죠

translation.en: [journalist] Thiago first.
Thiago, what does it mean for you to be captain of the national team again?
translation.ko: 치아구, 또 대표팀 주장이 됐는데 어떻게 생각하시나요?

translation.en: Do you feel emotionally ready?
[Silva] People say that, "Thiago is weak…
for having emotions."
I wouldn't have got to where I am today by being mentally weak.
Man, I had to be strong in one of the biggest battles of my life.
translation.ko: 그런 격렬한 경기는 어지간한 정신력으론 못 버텨요 "러시아 모스크바"

translation.en: I left Brazil when I was really young.
translation.ko: 전 아주 어릴 때 브라질을 떠났어요

translation.en: And from there, I had the opportunity to transfer to Dynamo Moscow.
translation.ko: 그리고 디나모 모스크바로 이적할 기회가 있었죠

translation.en: I trained and trained with a really painful chest.
translation.ko: 가슴이 엄청 아픈데도 훈련을 멈추지 않았어요

translation.en: I didn't know what was really going on.
I was almost dying, man.
INSTITUTE OF EMERGENCY CARE
The doctor held the X-ray up to the light
and you could see that there was a huge hole in my lung.
translation.ko: 폐에 큰 구멍이 나있는 게 선명하게 보였어요

translation.en: If we had waited any longer for the diagnosis, there would be no cure.
translation.ko: 진단받느라 지체하다간 치료 시기를 영영 놓칠 터였죠

translation.en: [Isabelle] The thoughts that he had… "I'll probably need surgery."
"I might not play again."
It was his whole career. Everything he ever dreamt of.
translation.ko: 선수로서 평생의 꿈이 끝날지 모르는 상황이었죠 "이사벨리 다 시우바 아내"

translation.en: I spent six months in the hospital, you know?
I was alone.
It's awful being away from home when your family is in Brazil.
translation.ko: 가족을 다 브라질에 두고 타지에서 지내는 건 힘들었어요

translation.en: Going through tuberculosis
left me with scars that will never heal.
When people say that I won a lot of trophies,
translation.ko: 우승컵을 많이 따서 뿌듯하지 않냐고들 하지만

translation.en: the biggest achievement of my life that I'm most proud of
translation.ko: 제 생애 가장 큰 업적이자 가장 자랑스러운 업적은

translation.en: was overcoming tuberculosis.
Man, I think all this comes from the press.
translation.ko: 언론에서 그런 얘기가 나오는 건 압니다

translation.en: I'm always prepared for every situation.
translation.ko: 전 어떤 상황이든 맞을 준비가 돼있어요

translation.en: It's a special moment.
I appreciate the trust from the coach
translation.ko: 감독님이 절 믿고 주장으로 임명해 주신 것이

translation.en: to be given the captaincy.
To beat me, you have to be stronger than me.
And that's tough.
[commentator in English] Planet football invites seduction by Brazil.
No group of players carries a greater burden.
No group is fueled by a greater privilege
than those in the shimmering shirts of canary yellow.
translation.ko: 부담감과 자부심을 동시에 주는 것도 없죠

translation.en: [Silva in Portuguese] You are representing an entire country when you wear the captain's armband,
translation.ko: 주장 완장을 차면 조국을 대표하는 거예요

translation.en: which might not sound like much.
But the whole country is here. They're well-represented.
translation.ko: 전 제가 찬 이 완장으로 브라질 전체를 대표해요

translation.en: [commentator in English] Now Neymar--
Instantly surrounded and bruised.
Here's Brazil's corner, which is punched up over his own crossbar.
translation.ko: 브라질의 코너킥 크로스바 위로 힘껏 쳐냅니다

translation.en: Júnior!
Half-time.
[commentator] Alex Sandro!
Neymar.
It's not happened for him, has it? Been a bit off.
Neymar turning on.
Bundled in, Richarlison!
For Brazil!
[commentator 1 in English] Trying to hold onto this lead… Vinícius Júnior.
And finding Richarlison!
[commentator 2 in Spanish] He spins! Look at that goal!
[commentator 1 in English] Now that, that is Brazil!
[Richarlison in Portuguese] I watched all the videos.
It's insane, right? [chuckles]
I spent days thinking about it,
and I can't believe it.
Man, that was me!
[commentator 1 in English] Neymar has taken another heavy hit.
[Silva in Portuguese] We looked and said, "What is happening?"
translation.ko: 쓰러진 걸 보면서 어떻게 된 거냐고 그랬어요

translation.en: Another injury.
[commentator 1 in English] And he has been here before.
translation.ko: "경기 종료 브라질 2-0 세르비아" 전에도 이런 적이 있죠

translation.en: [in Portuguese] In 2014…
[commentator in English] Neymar shoved over.
The medical staff for Brazil are signaling frantically towards the technical area.
translation.ko: 브라질 의료진이 기술지역에 급히 신호를 보냅니다

translation.en: [in Portuguese] We lost Neymar.
It was a major blow in terms of mentality
when you've lost your star player,
the guy who solves all the problems for you in games.
translation.ko: 경기가 안 풀릴 때 해결해 줄 수 있는 선수거든요

translation.en: The guy who causes all the problems for the opposition.
It took its toll on the team.
[in Spanish] There's a lot of concern with Neymar's situation.
translation.ko: 네이마르의 상태를 두고 우려의 목소리가 높습니다

translation.en: Is it all over for him?
The Brazilian Football Confederation has been silent on the subject.
We're still waiting to see what happens next with Neymar.
translation.ko: 네이마르가 어떻게 될지는 아직 기다려봐야 합니다

translation.en: [reporter in Portuguese] Who's the favorite to replace him?
All moments like this are of huge importance during a campaign.
translation.ko: 대회 중에 이런 사고가 생기면 후폭풍이 커요

translation.en: He came to the tournament with injuries. Now he's twisted his ankle.
[Lineker in English] The thing about World Cups
is that it's very easy for things to go wrong.
You need your best players to stay fit.
If Wales lose Bale, England lost Kane…
translation.ko: 웨일스가 베일을 잃거나 잉글랜드가 케인을 잃거나

translation.en: If Argentina lost Messi, it could kill you.
translation.ko: 아르헨티나가 메시를 잃으면 전부 끝날 수 있어요

translation.en: -[producer] Ready? Okay. -Sí.
[Messi in Spanish] World Cups are so difficult. Anything can happen.
translation.ko: 월드컵은 정말 어려워요 어떤 일이 일어날지 모르죠 "리오넬 메시 아르헨티나 주장"

translation.en: When we talk about World Cup favorites,
translation.ko: "리오넬 메시 아르헨티나 주장" 우승 후보국을 꼽자면

translation.en: I think Brazil, France and England
are a bit stronger than the rest right now.
translation.ko: 다른 팀보다 좀 더 강하다고 생각해요

translation.en: [in French] Which team keeps me up at night? All three of them.
translation.ko: "칼리두 쿨리발리 세네갈 주장" 어떤 팀 때문에 잠을 설치냐고요? 세 팀 다요

translation.en: [in Portuguese] I worry about all of them.
[Fàbregas in English] France will have a lot to say in this World Cup.
translation.ko: 프랑스는 이번 월드컵에서 증명해야 할 게 많아요

translation.en: They have the experience of winning it already.
[Deschamps in French] It's a fact.
We are the world champions.
translation.ko: 우린 세계 챔피언이에요 "디디에 데샹 프랑스 감독"

translation.en: [in French] We're still a competitive team
translation.ko: 우린 여전히 경쟁력 있고 "위고 요리스 프랑스 주장"

translation.en: with lots of young, talented players.
[in English] I really like England's team.
They have a very young, exciting generation.
translation.ko: 아주 젊고 폭발적인 선수들로 구성돼 있어요

translation.en: [Kane] A lot of us here are used to the hype around the national team.
translation.ko: 대표팀 승선의 부담감에 익숙한 선수들이 많아요

translation.en: Gotta want this, boys. [bleep]
Come on then! Come on!
-Come on! -Come on!
We're level-headed, we know what we need to do
translation.ko: 저희는 냉정하고 침착해요 계속 올라가기 위해서

translation.en: to go far in this tournament.
[in Danish] Argentina I see as… Perhaps favorites.
translation.ko: 전 아르헨티나가 가장 유력하다고 생각해요 "시몬 키예르 덴마크 주장"

translation.en: [Laurens in English] Argentina haven't won the World Cup since 1986,
and in that tournament,
it was lit up by the genius of Diego Maradona.
translation.ko: "줄리앙 로렌스 프랑스 기자" 마라도나의 천재성 덕분에 우승컵을 들었죠

translation.en: [commentator in Spanish] The most extraordinary goal in the history of the World Cup!
Diego Armando Maradona!
[Laurens in English] In 2020, tragedy struck…
[all chanting] Argentina! Argentina!
[in Spanish] Diego has passed…
due to a cardiac arrest.
It's shocking. Truly shocking.
DIEGO MARADONA DIES
-To be honest… -[sighs]
It's really weird not having him here, not seeing him in the stands,
not seeing people going crazy when he shows up.
translation.ko: 마라도나를 향한 관중의 환호성도 들을 수 없죠

translation.en: He made everyone feel something special.
translation.ko: 마라도나가 오기만 해도 뭔가 특별해지는 기분이에요

translation.en: It will be strange not to see him at such an important tournament.
translation.ko: 이렇게 중요한 대회에서 못 보니까 기분이 이상할 거예요

translation.en: People have always compared Messi with Maradona.
translation.ko: 사람들은 늘 메시를 마라도나와 비교했어요 "소피아 마르티네스 아르헨티나 기자"

translation.en: Maradona had a very strong personality on and off the pitch.
translation.ko: 마라도나는 필드 안팎에서 개성이 무척 강했죠

translation.en: Messi was more shy.
[commentator] Götze!
[in English] Germany are the champions of the world!
For Argentina, the wait goes painfully on.
[man in Spanish] He doesn't have the balls. He is soulless.
translation.ko: 공도 제대로 못 만지고 영혼이란 게 없어요 계속 응원했는데 더는 못 참아요

translation.en: I've always supported him, but it's enough.
Enough already! He's a fraud, a lie.
He has no passion, he walks on the pitch.
You can't compare him to Maradona.
It's true that there was a lot of criticism.
Many people didn't support Messi.
translation.ko: "월드컵 결승에서 뼈아픈 패배를 거둔 아르헨티나" 메시를 비판하는 사람이 많았죠

translation.en: Argentina is a very passionate country.
translation.ko: "잠잠했던 메시" 아르헨티나는 열정이 뜨거운 나라예요 "세르히오 부스케츠"

translation.en: We know all the baggage he had to carry.
translation.ko: "마라도나의 그늘을 벗어나지 못한 메시" 메시를 짓누르는 중압감은 우리도 잘 알아요

translation.en: When you don't win,
everyone may blame you.
[commentator in English] Lionel Messi…
-And he's missed it! -[crowd cheering]
More shoot-out agony for Argentina.
translation.ko: 또 승부차기의 악몽에 시달립니다 "칠레, 승부차기로 승리"

translation.en: [Martinez in Spanish] Messi fought really hard. The results didn't go his way.
translation.ko: 메시는 열심히 싸웠지만 결과가 따라주지 않았어요

translation.en: How many finals have Argentina lost lately?
translation.ko: 최근 아르헨티나가 결승전에서 몇 번이나 졌나요?

translation.en: How difficult was it for him?
[Messi] It's the end for me in the national team.
As I just said, it's been four finals, it's not for me.
Messi felt that the Argentina team wasn't for him, that's incredible.
translation.ko: 놀랍게도 메시는 자기가 대표팀과 맞지 않는다고 했어요

translation.en: That's what he once said, "It's not for me."
I couldn't make it. I think I'm done.
Is that your final decision?
I think so. I don't know.
Then he tried again.
And again. And again.
[commentator in English] Pavard… Oh, how about that!
Mbappé… He's got another one!
Messi's out of the World Cup.
[in Spanish] There's no doubt Messi is not the same as he was in his first World Cup.
translation.ko: 첫 월드컵에 출전했던 메시와 지금의 메시는 전혀 달라요

translation.en: His manner of leadership has changed.
That's why we'll go out to the pitch, raise the cup,
translation.ko: 우린 필드에 나가서 우승컵을 들어 올리고

translation.en: and take it to Argentina to enjoy it with family and friends…
translation.ko: 아르헨티나로 가져가서 가족과 친구들과 함께 즐겨야 해

translation.en: There was a turning point in his relationship with the fans
after the Copa América that Argentina won, obviously.
[commentator in English] Lionel Messi finally has a title with his country.
translation.ko: "코파 아메리카 챔피언" 마침내 리오넬 메시가 조국에 우승컵을 안겨줍니다

translation.en: [Fàbregas] It's Leo's last chance
translation.ko: 메시에겐 마지막 기회예요 전 아르헨티나를 둘러싼 특별한 힘이 있다고 믿어요

translation.en: and I believe that Argentina has something special surrounding them.
translation.ko: 전 아르헨티나를 둘러싼 특별한 힘이 있다고 믿어요

translation.en: [in Spanish] When Messi made his debut in the national team,
this new generation, today's players, were six, eight, ten years old.
translation.ko: 지금 대표팀에서 뛰는 젊은 선수들은 10살도 안 됐어요

translation.en: So when they were kids and dreamed of being footballers,
translation.ko: 그 선수들은 어릴 때 메시를 롤모델로 삼고

translation.en: they saw Messi as a role model.
[Allister] As his teammates,
we see that both on and off the pitch, he is happy, he feels good,
translation.ko: 메시가 경기장 안팎에서 즐거워하는 모습이 보여요

translation.en: and that is very important to us.
They want Messi to be champion more than they want it for themselves.
translation.ko: 선수들은 무엇보다도 메시가 우승컵을 들길 바라요

translation.en: We are up against great players who know exactly what they're doing.
[producer in English] How are you doing? Comfortable?
Sí. Yeah.
[Ronaldo in Portuguese] If you asked me, if I finished my career today,
would I be happy?
Yes, of course!
[commentator] Ronaldo!
But a World Cup win would be fun.
translation.ko: "크리스티아누 호날두 포르투갈 주장" 하지만 월드컵도 우승하면 좋죠

translation.en: I don't chase records.
Records chase me.
Pressure?
Every player here feels pressure.
[commentator] Ronaldo!
There's always been pressure ever since I left Madeira, aged 11.
translation.ko: 11살에 마데이라를 떠난 후로 전 늘 부담감을 안고 살았어요

translation.en: [in English] You get to the final.
Portugal v. Argentina.
You score two, Messi scores two.
translation.ko: 본인이 두 골 메시가 두 골 넣었어요

translation.en: The last minute you score a third for your hat-trick
translation.ko: 본인이 두 골 메시가 두 골 넣었어요 종료 직전 본인이 해트트릭을 달성하면서

translation.en: and you win the World Cup.
Is that… Be honest…
-It's too good, come on. -…is that the dream?
translation.ko: - 너무 비현실적인데요? - 기대해 본 적 있나요?

translation.en: Yeah, I'd retire. 100%.
[Ronaldo in Portuguese] The goals will come naturally, as usual.
Dreaming is something I have always enjoyed.
translation.ko: 전 늘 뭔가 꿈꾸는 게 즐거웠어요

translation.en: Everybody wants to win, but there can only be one winner.
translation.ko: 모두 우승을 꿈꾸지만 우승하는 건 단 한 팀이죠

translation.en: [commentator in English] The stage is well and truly set.
[fans] Messi!
[commentator] This tournament has given such joy to the country of Argentina at times.
[fans] Messi!
[commentator] This trophy has not been theirs
since it was lifted high by Maradona in Mexico.
Most eyes will be on Argentina's number 10, Lionel Messi.
A real sense of expectation inside the stadium this evening.
translation.ko: "포르투갈 대 가나" 오늘 저녁엔 엄청난 기대감이 경기장을 감싸고 있습니다

translation.en: Away we go then.
It's a snappy turn and it's Messi!
Argentina knocking on the door within the first couple of minutes.
[player] Yes, yes!
[commentator 2] Ghana lose out, and a great chance here for Cristiano Ronaldo!
[commentator 1] There is an issue which has halted play here.
What's the decision?
[commentator 3 in Spanish] What's the decision?
[commentator 1 in English] It is penalty!
[commentator 3 in Spanish] Penalty for Argentina!
[commentator 1 in English] Argentina, handed an opportunity to grab an early lead.
[commentator 3 in Spanish] Here comes the captain of Argentina.
Here comes Messi!
Messi scores!
[commentator 1 in English] Lionel Messi, always center stage,
translation.ko: "아르헨티나 1-0 사우디" 리오넬 메시는 늘 무대의 주인공이고

translation.en: often seen with silverware,
but this is the trophy he really wants to win.
[commentator 2] Ronaldo…
[commentator 1] That is the end of the first 45 minutes.
[commentator 2] The look on his face tells you all you need to know
about Portugal's first half.
[commentator 1] It's Argentina who have the lead by a goal to nil.
translation.ko: 아르헨티나가 한 골 차로 앞서고 있습니다

translation.en: What are we doing here?
Messi, at the middle of the pitch.
He has the ball, you stay in front of the defense.
translation.ko: 공 가지고 있는데 수비진 앞에서 보기만 해?

translation.en: Take your phone, you can make a picture with him!
You are in front of the defense!
You have nobody, he's got it, you follow!
[in Arabic] You're in front of the defense! Follow and block him!
translation.ko: 수비진 앞에서 뭐 하냐고! 메시 쫓아가서 막아!

translation.en: [in English] Come on, this is the World Cup!
You don't feel we are able to come back? You don't feel it?
translation.ko: 경기력 끌어올릴 자신 없어? 그렇게 못 하겠어?

translation.en: Give everything!
Be like this! Concentrate!
[in Arabic] Stay ready! Come on!
[commentator 1 in English] Well, Saudi Arabia are collecting their thoughts
translation.ko: 사우디아라비아 선수들이 필드에 다시 들어오기 전에

translation.en: ahead of coming back out to the pitch
and looking to try and do a job in the second half.
They have managed to get a goal on the board
thanks to their main man.
Argentina ahead, but not entirely comfortable.
[commentator 2] Saudi Arabia are throwing bodies in the way, working so hard.
[commentator 1] Messi.
[commentator 2] Giving it away because of the pressure.
[commentator 3 in Arabic] An opportunity to score! This is it!
Goal!
[commentator 1 in English] A blockbuster start to the second half for Saudi Arabia!
translation.ko: 사우디아라비아가 후반에 대서사시를 써 내려갑니다 "아르헨티나 1-1 사우디"

translation.en: The slender Argentina lead evaporates in an instant.
[commentator] Little flick from João Félix.
Penalty!
Ronaldo, who will create World Cup history if he scores
translation.ko: 호날두는 이번에 득점하면 월드컵의 새 역사를 씁니다

translation.en: by becoming the first man to score at five FIFA World Cups.
translation.ko: 월드컵 5회 연속 득점이라는 대기록을 세우게 됩니다

translation.en: -It's 1-0 Portugal… -[commentator 2] Goal!
translation.ko: - 포르투갈 1 대 0! - 골! 월드컵 역사를 새로 씁니다

translation.en: [commentator 1] …and it's a moment of World Cup history.
[commentator 2 in Portuguese] The father of Portugal!
[commentator 1 in English] Messi goes down and belatedly a free-kick is given Argentina's way.
You feel the tension here.
Lionel Messi has the focus.
It is Messi…
And it's over, and considerably so.
Kudus to pull it back across… Ayew!
translation.ko: 쿠두스가 낮게 깔아준 공 아이유의 골!

translation.en: Ghana are back level! André Ayew with the equalizer!
translation.ko: 가나가 추격합니다! 안드레 아이유의 동점 골!

translation.en: They weren't behind for long.
Fernandes…
He's played it through. Chance for Portugal…
2-1 Portugal.
And the strike is decent.
[commentator 2 in Arabic] Saudi Arabia are still pressing! Shot!
Oh, my God!
Impossible…
Nothing is impossible for Saudi Arabia!
Yes! Against Argentina!
[commentator 1 in English] He's got options here.
[commentator 2 in Portuguese] Portuguese attack…
Goal for Leão!
[commentator 1 in English] It's victory for Portugal,
five goals in the second half.
Cristiano Ronaldo's penalty started it all off.
[commentator 2 in Arabic] They've rewritten history!
Here from Lusail Stadium! Yes! You've made history!
[commentator 3 in Spanish] Shocking! Shocking result!
[commentator 1 in English] The FIFA World Cup 2022 has its first
jaw-dropping, eye-catching shock result.
translation.ko: "사우디 3 아르헨티나 0" 입이 떡 벌어질 만큼 충격적인 결과입니다

translation.en: [journalist in Portuguese] This week a photo was published by Louis Vuitton
translation.ko: 호날두 선수와 메시 선수가 체스를 두는 장면으로

translation.en: of you and Messi, a photo that symbolizes intelligence
translation.ko: 지능과 시간의 흐름을 표현한 루이 비통의 화보가

translation.en: and time passing by.
Messi recently stated that this would be his last World Cup.
translation.ko: 메시 선수는 이번 월드컵이 마지막이라고 밝혔는데

translation.en: I ask you, is this your last World Cup?
And who will checkmate whom?
Checkmate?
You checkmate in life, not only in chess.
translation.ko: 체크메이트는 체스 말고 인생에서도 할 수 있어요

translation.en: You can checkmate in life,
I often checkmate.
I want to be the one to checkmate him.
[Laurens in English] Argentina, losing to Saudi Arabia,
one of the biggest upsets in the history of the World Cup,
in the history of football.
Each team have got different ambitions and objectives
depending if you are a big or a small country.
Here we go, guys.
Showtime, guys. You ready?
[Laurens] There's a feeling that everybody is behind you.
You play for the people back home who want you to win.
[woman] Sir, you have the US Men's National Soccer Team.
Coach, put me in, I'm ready to play.
Tell you what, you've got some of the best players in the world on your team
translation.ko: 우리 대표팀에는 정상급 선수들이 뛰고 있어요

translation.en: and you're representing this country
and I know you're gonna play your hearts out, so let's go shock 'em all.
Keep trusting in one another,
play as hard as you can, and the whole country's rooting for you.
translation.ko: 최대한 열심히 뛰세요 온 미국이 응원할 겁니다

translation.en: That's a very nice message, Mr. President. The whole team is here.
translation.ko: 좋은 말씀 감사합니다, 대통령님 선수들이 다 모여서 들었어요

translation.en: We really appreciate your support and we're ready to go.
I really wish I were there to see you.
translation.ko: 직접 경기를 보지 못해서 정말 아쉬워요

translation.en: Go get 'em, guys, just play your hearts out.
-We've got this. -I know you will.
Our mission is to change the way the world views American soccer.
translation.ko: 미국 축구를 향한 세계의 인식을 바꿀 거예요

translation.en: US soccer, in general, has always been perceived that we're kind of pushovers.
translation.ko: 세상은 늘 미국을 만만한 상대로 여겼어요

translation.en: ♪ O say can you see… ♪
[Adams] In the past, we had not too many players that were playing in Europe.
translation.ko: 예전에는 유럽에서 뛰는 선수가 별로 없었어요

translation.en: Now a lot of guys are playing Champions League,
at some of the best clubs around the world.
[commentator] Here is Christian Pulisic. Scores it well.
USA!
We have a lot of confidence, youth, and agility.
translation.ko: 우리 팀은 자신감 넘치고 젊고 민첩해요

translation.en: [commentator] And it's Weah!
[chanting] USA! USA!
Come on!
[Adams] Our first game of the World Cup is against Wales.
It's tough.
When you face Gareth Bale, where do you begin?
You know, what a career.
He plays for something even more than just himself or for his club.
translation.ko: 자기만족이나 클럽만을 위해 뛰는 선수가 아니에요

translation.en: [producer] You've had a stellar career.
-You've won four Champions Leagues? -Five.
[commentator] It's the spectacular, it's Gareth Bale!
[in Portuguese] I thought, "Man, this guy is a phenomenon."
[commentator in English] Bale, eyes it up, lines it up.
Big players turn up for big games, and he falls into that category.
[commentator] The dragon has roared! Wales are going to the World Cup!
I wouldn't say I've completely neglected my clubs.
The proudest thing you can do as an athlete,
never mind a footballer, is to represent your country.
translation.ko: 가장 자랑스러운 건 조국을 대표하는 거예요

translation.en: [commentator] Qatar, here they come!
The thing with Bale is, he started very young,
translation.ko: 베일은 어릴 때부터 많은 경기를 소화했어요

translation.en: he played lots of games.
It's tough because he's had also a lot of injuries.
translation.ko: 너무 많은 부상에 시달려서 정말 힘들 거예요

translation.en: -[Bale groans] -And again, lift.
This is likely to be a last hurrah.
We know he's been past his best for a few years now.
But has he got anything left in him?
[producer] It looks like his fingers are inside your body.
Well they're not 'cause they're outside my body.
If they were inside I'd be very worried.
-[producer] It looks deep inside. -I don't think you can do that in Qatar.
translation.ko: - 되게 깊이 들어갔어요 - 카타르에선 이러면 안 되는데

translation.en: To be playing for Wales and taking them to the World Cup,
translation.ko: 웨일스 대표팀이 돼서 월드컵 본선에 진출한다는 게

translation.en: for it to become a reality is surreal.
translation.ko: 꿈인지 생시인지도 잘 분간이 안 돼요

translation.en: It's not a good sight, that one, for me. It really isn't a good sight.
translation.ko: 보기 좋진 않네요 별로 보기 좋지 않아요

translation.en: It's not too bad.
[Bale] Whenever I meet up with Wales, it just feels like home.
translation.ko: 웨일스 대표팀과 있을 때면 꼭 고향에 돌아온 기분이에요

translation.en: The players, we've grown up together and played with each other a long time.
I know everybody sees I'm quite quiet,
but I like to joke around and get people going.
Man, that hurt. Like, you done that too hard.
[Bale] It's about us as a team trying to do as best as we can.
translation.ko: 우리는 한 팀이고 최선을 다한다는 게 중요해요

translation.en: I don't get it.
It's been 64 years since we've qualified for a World Cup, since 1958.
My generation, even my parents' generation.
We've never had our team playing there.
translation.ko: 우리 세대가 본선에서 뛰는 건 처음이에요

translation.en: [Jones] To put that Welsh shirt on for me
translation.ko: "클리프 존스 전 웨일스 미드필더" 대표팀 유니폼을 입는 건

translation.en: was one of the big honors of my footballing career.
translation.ko: 제 선수 인생에서도 경험하기 힘든 영광이었어요

translation.en: [Bale] Cliff Jones, I've met him a lot of times.
He's a role model.
Cliff, you okay?
Gareth, how are you, son?
One big difference between me and Gareth Bale…
translation.ko: 저와 가레스 베일의 가장 큰 차이라면…

translation.en: -How are you? -I'm good, you?
I think I'm better-looking.
[commentator] Wales, driving forward.
Oh, what a goal!
The crowd are delighted!
We got to the quarter-finals and played Brazil.
[Jones] Nobody had heard about Pelé.
"Who's this kid, 17 years of age?"
[Bale] Pelé had scored the winner.
[commentator] And the ball falls to Pelé! And he scores!
[Jones] To represent Wales in the World Cup,
doesn't get much better than that.
[Bale] Hopefully we can go as far as them, if not further.
[man] We've had so many near misses, so many disappointments.
It's one of those things you get, following Wales.
translation.ko: 웨일스에 늘 따라붙는 꼬리표 같은 거예요

translation.en: [man] We've always had very good players,
but we've found difficulty meshing them into a team.
[Driscoll] Ian Rush.
Neville Southall.
Ryan Giggs.
Mark Hughes.
Gary Speed.
[Blanche] Wales were in the doldrums when he took over.
They were ranked 117th in the world. They couldn't get any lower.
translation.ko: 세계 랭킹 117위이었어요 더 떨어질 곳도 없었죠

translation.en: [Bale] Gary Speed came in and really changed the mentality of everybody.
The face of Wales, of the national team,
not just the football, but the infrastructure
and that club kind of environment.
It is a big task, but I'm just thankful I've got the opportunity
translation.ko: 어깨가 무겁지만 웨일스를 빛낼 기회가 생겨서 "게리 스피드 전 웨일스 감독"

translation.en: to try and make Wales successful
translation.ko: "게리 스피드 전 웨일스 감독" 무척 기쁩니다

translation.en: and it's an opportunity I look forward to.
[Bale] Before Speed, it was more we just turned up for Wales.
We played, we didn't do so well and it was kind of just stuck in a rut.
translation.ko: 경기력이 좋지 않았어요 계속 답보 상태였죠

translation.en: [Blanche] Players who hadn't turned up before were suddenly wanting to be part of Wales.
translation.ko: 대표팀에서 뛰지 않았던 선수들이 갑자기 너도나도 뛰겠다고 했어요

translation.en: It was far more professional.
He laid the foundations, really, uh, of the success we're seeing today.
translation.ko: 오늘날 대표팀의 성공은 감독님이 닦은 기초 덕분이에요

translation.en: It's fabulous to see Wales playing in the World Cup.
translation.ko: 월드컵 본선 무대에서 웨일스를 보는 건 감회가 남달라요

translation.en: Particular in the recent history of what's happened to them.
translation.ko: 특히 최근 웨일스 대표팀에 일어났던 일을 보면 더 그렇죠

translation.en: The Welsh football manager Gary Speed has died at the age of 42.
translation.ko: 웨일스의 게리 스피드 감독이 42세를 일기로 사망했습니다

translation.en: The Football Association of Wales has told the BBC
that it appears he had taken his own life.
The next time I sent him a message, was yesterday morning.
translation.ko: 제가 다시 문자를 보낸 건 어제 아침이었습니다

translation.en: It said, "Sick rumor doing the rounds, mate, please give me a call."
translation.ko: '불안한 소문이 돌아 제발 연락 좀 해줘'

translation.en: There was no call.
Oh, Bryn.
[Bale] We still speak about him to this day.
Everyone involved will tell you how grateful the whole nation is.
If he didn't come in at that moment, we might not be where we are now.
translation.ko: 감독님이 없었다면 지금의 웨일스도 없었을 거예요

translation.en: We might not have had that foundation
to achieve what we've achieved.
[Lineker] If he's watching somewhere,
I think he'd be proud of what's happened.
Obviously it's fantastic this morning
that we have one of the great Welsh actors,
More than Welsh, British, international actors.
Who's the actor?
Michael Sheen.
Oh, wow.
You can't do better than that, can you?
I mean, play that before every game.
Speech.
I'll try and give you something to take with you.
translation.ko: 여러분이 좋아할 만한 걸 준비해 왔어요

translation.en: Okay… [groans]
All right.
[commentator] Wales return to the World Cup after a 64-year absence.
translation.ko: 웨일스가 64년간의 공백을 깨고 월드컵 본선 무대로 돌아왔습니다

translation.en: [in Welsh] Still here!
[in English] I hear the voices singing.
Speed your journey, boys.
[Bale] I've been thinking about this moment and preparing for this moment.
translation.ko: 전 계속 이 순간을 생각하고 이 순간을 위해 준비했어요

translation.en: To lead your country out for the first time in 64 years…
translation.ko: 64년 만에 처음으로 나선 조국을 이끄는 거죠

translation.en: Come on, Wales!
[Sheen in Welsh] Still here.
Still here!
[Sheen in English] A red storm is coming!
[Bale] …it just means that a little more.
You were born it. You were raised it.
It's in your blood.
[crowd in Welsh] ♪ We are still here! ♪
[commentator in English] Wales are back after 64 years,
translation.ko: "2022 FIFA 월드컵 B조 미국 대 웨일스" 웨일스가 64년 만에 복귀했습니다

translation.en: the longest gap between qualifications in World Cup history.
Come on!
They're not actually that good, are they?
[fans chanting] USA! USA! USA!
[commentator] Weah is in behind Neco Williams, plays it into the middle!
translation.ko: 니코 윌리엄스 뒤에 웨아가 있죠 가운데로 올립니다!

translation.en: It's almost an own-goal by Rodon!
Hennessey didn't know much about it, but he got his body in behind it.
translation.ko: 헤네시는 반응하지 못했지만 공이 몸을 맞고 튀어나왔습니다

translation.en: Danger not passed yet.
Sargent!
Very hairy moments there for Wales.
[Bale] We were in complete control. One of the better halves we've played.
translation.ko: 경기는 우리가 장악했어요 최고의 전반전을 보냈죠

translation.en: Our performance was dominant.
[commentator] Really seeing very little of Gareth Bale up front so far for Wales.
translation.ko: 전방의 가레스 베일은 거의 보이지 않습니다

translation.en: Musah. Bale.
And the Wales captain is in the book for protesting.
translation.ko: 주장 가레스 베일이 항의하다 카드를 받습니다

translation.en: Come on, Bale, fucking hell. Switch on, mate.
translation.ko: 베일, 정신 차리고 잘 좀 해봐

translation.en: [commentator] Hennessey's clearance. He's looking for Bale.
Ream was right there with him.
If you're a USA fan, you must be feeling rather optimistic.
[fans chanting] USA! USA!
[commentator] Pulisic… Plays it through. It's Weah!
And Weah scores for the USA!
And it's been coming, you have to say.
translation.ko: 미국의 기세가 여간 거센 게 아니었어요

translation.en: Wales have it all to do now.
It's been an excellent first half for the United States of America.
Frankly, they've been cut apart so often
in that opening 45 minutes.
[fans] USA!
[Adams] I honestly don't recall Wales even being in our half of the field.
translation.ko: 솔직히 웨일스는 전반 내내 우리 쪽으로 오지도 못했어요

translation.en: We dominated. We came in at half time and we said,
"If we can get another 45-minute performance like that,
we win the game."
Serge. Be smart. But everyone else get [bleep] stuck in.
translation.ko: 세르지뇨, 잘 생각해 너희도 적극적으로 움직여

translation.en: -Bale's looking cut off. -[indistinct chatter]
[Berhalter] Forty-five minutes, we see it out. Let's go!
Let's go!
[Sheen] A song of hope.
A song of defiance.
A victory song!
[Bale] Probably one of the most difficult things is to play a game
translation.ko: 경기에 나설 때 가장 힘든 건

translation.en: when you have a slight injury.
I know the risks.
But if there's a chance you can affect the game then it's worth taking that risk.
translation.ko: 하지만 결과를 바꿀 능력이 있다면 그런 위험도 무릅써야 해요

translation.en: The pages of the history books, waiting to be written.
translation.ko: 백지로 가득한 책이 우리 앞에 펼쳐져 있어요

translation.en: Open to you right there.
[Bale] So we keep fighting till the end.
They don't know what's coming.
[commentator] Up in the air from Tyler Adams.
Header towards goal! And it's pushed over by Turner!
-[man] What a save! -[woman] Wow.
Good start! Well done!
Come on! Come on!
[Adams] When you see your star player running and battling like that,
translation.ko: 팀의 간판선수가 열심히 달리고 구르는 걸 보면

translation.en: it sends a message to every player on that field.
I think he set the standard and set the expectation
for the rest of his team to just continue battling.
translation.ko: 다른 선수들도 계속 싸울 수밖에 없는 거죠

translation.en: [mouthing] Just keep breathing.
I know you're tired, but you just gotta do it.
translation.ko: 힘든 거 알아 그래도 할 땐 해야 해

translation.en: [Sheen] They'll always say we're too small…
[commentator] Headed over the top!
[Sheen] …too weak…
[commentator] So close.
[Sheen] …too full of fear.
[commentator] Two excellent chances for Wales.
Yes, yes!
[Sheen] Sixty-four years, and far from home.
[commentator] Penalty, Wales!
Bale is brought down! It's a penalty to Wales!
Close your eyes…
and feel the breath on the back of your necks,
because that's every man, woman and child
in this old land, standing there with you
at your back.
[commentator] All around Wales…
In the cities and in the valleys,
a nation holds its breath.
[Sheen in Welsh] Still here!
[commentator] Did anyone have any doubt?
Gareth Bale!
With his most important goal for his country.
translation.ko: 조국을 위해 천금 같은 골을 넣습니다!

translation.en: [coach] These [bleep] don't know who Australian players are.
Go and show these [bleep] who we are!
-Get out there and get into them! -Come on, let's go!
[reporter] Do you feel that you and the Danish FA can speak out about other issues
translation.ko: 이번 대회의 다른 사안들에 대해 본인이나 덴마크축구협회가

translation.en: when it comes to this tournament?
[in Danish] My job is playing football.
I'm not good with politics.
Where is Messi?
[Messi in Spanish] There are moments of tension, of friction.
[commentator in English] This is a mind game to end them all.
The story of the tournament is being written here!
Oh, it's in! Remarkable!
[in Portuguese] Talk about the competition. Stop asking questions about me.
translation.ko: 제 얘기는 그만하고 월드컵 얘기 좀 하죠

translation.en: -[in French] It's for Netflix? -Yep.
I'm going to be on Netflix?
Yes, you'll be on Netflix.
No, you should have told me! I'd have dressed better.
translation.ko: 미리 말해줬으면 더 잘 입었을 거 아냐!
